objects.specification: A broad, flat rectangular floor surface with a smooth, slightly textured finish in a uniform neutral grey tone. The material is designed to resemble polished concrete or a resilient classroom-safe finish, providing a sturdy and slip-resistant ground plane. The edges are sharp and clean to form a perfect rectangle matching the room dimensions.

A vertical flat wall panel with a light neutral paint finish that covers the full width of the room. The wall has a subtle matte texture to reduce glare and reflectivity, with crisp edges and a consistent thickness for a clean architectural feel.

A vertical flat wall panel painted in a light, neutral off-white color with a smooth finish. The surface is uniform, providing an ideal background for mounted elements and minimizing visual distractions.
A full-height side wall painted in a soft neutral hue, with a smooth, matte surface and uniform thickness. The crisp vertical edges define the room boundary and support mounted fixtures.
A full-height side wall panel in a light neutral color with a consistent, matte finish and reinforced edges. The wall provides a clean backdrop for windows and decorative elements.

A large rectangular window with clear glass panes and a slim white frame. The glass is slightly reflective and transparent to allow ample natural light while limiting heat gain. The overall appearance is modern and functional.

A pair of fabric curtains in a warm neutral tone, hanging from a thin metal rod. The curtains have gentle folds and a medium-weight drape texture, designed to be pulled aside or closed for light control and privacy.

A large rectangular teacher desk with a smooth wooden surface finished in a warm medium-brown wood tone. The edges are slightly rounded and the desk features simple, sturdy legs with a subtle bevel detail, offering a classic and professional look.

An adjustable teacher chair with a wooden frame and cushioned seat upholstered in a complementary fabric. The backrest is tall and slightly curved for ergonomic support, and the overall finish matches the wooden tone of the teacher desk.
A rectangular wall-mounted whiteboard with a glossy writing surface and a slim anodized aluminum frame. The board has a clean, reflective finish to enhance marker visibility and easy erasing.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector in matte white plastic, featuring a lens at the front and small ventilation grilles. The mount is adjustable to allow precise alignment with the whiteboard surface.

A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with colorful books. The frame is constructed from the same warm medium-brown wood as the desks, with clean edges and a matte protective finish.

A round wall clock with a thin white frame and a crisp glass cover. The clock face features bold black numerals on a clean white background and slender black hands for a minimalist, easy-to-read design.
A potted plant with lush green foliage arranged in a radial pattern. The leaves are glossy and slightly varied in shape, housed in a simple ceramic pot with a matte finish and a neutral color.
A flush-mounted ceiling light with a round translucent diffuser that spreads even, bright illumination. The fixture has a thin white metal trim and a subtle low-profile design.
A flush-mounted ceiling light with a round translucent diffuser that spreads even, bright illumination. The fixture has a thin white metal trim and a subtle low-profile design.

A colorful educational poster with vibrant graphics and clear text, printed on matte paper. The poster is framed by a slim border and designed to enhance learning with vivid imagery and organized content.

A medium-sized open-top waste bin made of durable plastic in a neutral grey color. The bin has a smooth exterior and rounded edges for safety and easy cleaning.

A rectangular student desk with a smooth wooden surface finished in a warm light-brown tone. The desk has minimalistic straight legs and a slightly rounded tabletop edge for comfort and safety.
A simple student chair with a wooden frame stained in a complementary darker brown tone. The seat is slightly contoured and the backrest is gently curved for basic ergonomic support.
